document_data.name: Vale sounder
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Perilous Gateways/Portals of Lantan: Vale Sounders}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Vale sounders''' were magical horns used to defend the [[Welcome Gates]] in the [[Visitors’ Vale]] on the island of [[Suj]].{{Cite web/Perilous Gateways/Portals of Lantan:The Welcome Gates}}
document_data.Description: Vale sounders were iron horns {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}} in length with a dual-tone output.
document_data.Powers:
Upon activation, they emitted a shrill screech alongside a deep thrum, creating a cacophony of sound waves that clashed disharmoniously. This sonic assault radiated in a {{SI|120|ft|long=yes}} cone. The sounder's low rumble caused the ground to shake intensely.

Creatures caught within the sonic cone lost concentration due to the horn's ear-piercing shriek and became deaf for several days. The ''[[silence]]'' spell mitigated these effects, although it did not prevent the ground quakes.
